name: Penguins Can Fly (Rebonnn)
description:
Penguins can fly. Unreal? You're wrong. Everything is possible with us. The game will allow you to control a flying penguin that soars up from the vapors of a geyser. Good game!

Our first project for Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1 We tried to make the game as fun and interesting as possible. We will be glad to hear your opinion and suggestions for improvements.

The project was created by

Rebonnn - Nikita - game designer, 3D artist

Mad Wolf - Oleg - programmer
